title: How to download any software for free - Quora

response.answer_text: What are the software you want 1 Downloading Torrents (THIS IS ILLEGAL but still I do it) 2 Downloading freeware (means the dedicated software is free) 3 Don't look Here (Told you Don't) (YOU Little Piece of weird stuff) Have a good day (Ask me If you don't know how to download torrent files)
Just type “download “software name” for free” in any search bar, you'll get various links to download that software for free.
